subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN3076 has been delivered
description_text:

for the base so can we get that on the way also I ordered a hand brake 2

conversations.body_text: Hi Damien Jassor,      This is the logistics tracking link for the base plate. We apologize for the inconvenience caused. The U.S. warehouse was previously out of stock and has only recently completed restocking.  https://www.fedex.com/wtrk/track/?trknbr=394752945190
